name: The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki - Northern War
summary:
A smartphone RPG based on the anime The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki - Northern War.

In addition to the story of the anime, the mobile game will feature an original story and new characters. The tactical orbment system “ARCUS II” introduced in The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III will also be implemented. Players will be able to explore the world while progressing through the story, and experience the “pure emotion and exhilaration” of the Trails of Cold Steel series’ battles on mobile devices.
